_source.text: 5. Our most popular annual programs-Kite Flight, Summer Solstice, and Halloween Harvest-returned, bigger and better than ever, to the delight of park visitors

text: 5. Our most popular annual programs-**Kite** Flight, **Summer** Solstice, and Halloween Harvest-returned
, bigger and **better** **than** ever, to the delight of park visitors

_source.text: 2 of my all-time favorite bands playing outside on a hot summer night... it's hard to get much better than that.

text: 2 of my all-time favorite bands playing outside on a hot **summer** **night**... it's hard to get much **better** **than** that.

_source.text: After a sizzling day in the sun, there is nothing better than a cool summer night.

text: After a sizzling day in the sun, there is nothing **better** **than** a cool **summer** **night**.

_source.text: After a long 15 hour day doing horribly tiring administrative work in the air conditioned office, nothing is better then sitting outside on a cool summer night and having a beer with your friends slash coworkers.

text: , nothing **is** **better** then sitting outside on a cool **summer** **night** and having a beer with your friends slash coworkers.
